description:
The Chief of Wing Bind Pipers; as well as Ninny and Noel`s boss. Although he has plenty to say about Ninny and Noel`s work, he never travels to the scene himself. He appears disorganized, wears a clueless expression, and is generally unreliable. Although he`s technically the boss, this doesn`t stop Ninny and Noel from doing whatever they want.
Source: Official English Website
name: Chief
